channel.title: Help please
channel.description:
ok i need help im adding spec's on my server and here's the tut im doing it from
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,101473.0.html
it says ive got to add a boolean but whats thats and were do i add the bit hes told me to add ive added the void and that but im a bit stuck on the boolean thanks if possible tell me were i put this
[code]sendQuest("@blu@ "+specBar,174); // specs - by 2hnderspeckr if (specTimer < 60) { // specs - by 2hnderspeckr specTimer += 1; // specs - by 2hnderspeckr } if (specTimer >= (60 - (playerLevel[playerMagic] / 2)) && spec < 10) { // specs - by 2hnderspeckr spec += 1; // specs - by 2hnderspeckr specTimer = 0; // specs - by 2hnderspeckr } checkSpec();[/code]

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Mmmm_Java Mmmm Java
item.description:
@Mmmm_Java wrote:

he said to put it under the process method, this

public boolean process() {		// is being called regularily every 500ms

put what he said under that

Read full topic

item.title: Help please

item.description:

ok i need help im adding spec’s on my server and here’s the tut im doing it from

programming, irc, cars

it says ive got to add a boolean but whats thats and were do i add the bit hes told me to add ive added the void and that but im a bit stuck on the boolean thanks if possible tell me were i put this

sendQuest("@blu@ "+specBar,174); // specs - by 2hnderspeckr if (specTimer < 60) { // specs - by 2hnderspeckr specTimer += 1; // specs - by 2hnderspeckr } if (specTimer >= (60 - (playerLevel[playerMagic] / 2)) && spec < 10) { // specs - by 2hnderspeckr spec += 1; // specs - by 2hnderspeckr specTimer = 0; // specs - by 2hnderspeckr } checkSpec();
